channel.title: Msn Was Hacked: Possible virus?
channel.description:
My MSN: Marcisboss@hotmail.com was hacked and the guy changed all the information and stuff. I even just found out today he tried to add several hacked credit cards to my paypal account and paypal ended up limiting it.
This brings up 2 questions:
1) I think I have some kind of keylogger on my computer. AVG and AntiMalewarebites doesnt show anything. What should I use?
2) Whats a good technique to recover my msn? I am currently in the recover process but the guy changed all the information so basically the only thing that I was able to input was my IP so hopefully they can see that 99% of the connections made on it were from my IP

item.title: Msn Was Hacked: Possible virus?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

Cole1497:

Everyone’s is getting hacked. It’s even happening to Yahoo. It’s a really awful way of advertising, because The Wanderer and Riku are both telling be about how I no longer have to be flaccid, and can go to their link and prevent limp dick.

DON’T BELIEVE HIM!@#!@#@!#!
I JUST WANTED KINKY SUPRISE BUT S3X

Read full topic
